title: Cup And Saucer
dimensions:
H x diam. (saucer): 2.9 x 11.8 cm (1 1/8 x 4 5/8 in.)
H x diam. (cup): 4.2 x 7.4 cm (1 5/8 x 2 15/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of the C. Helme and Alice B. Strater Collection
description: White glass with slight blue cast.  Painted decoration.  A pair of birds sit on a pair of red trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And Saucer.
glass. Gift of the C. Helme and Alice B. Strater Collection. 1976-1-71-a,b.
